holistic_ikigai_analysis.methodology: 3-phase comprehensive analysis using full context windows
holistic_ikigai_analysis.primary_ikigai: Advancing digital identity security and interoperability through open standards and collaborative professional communities
secondary_areas: Personal cybersecurity hygiene and privacy vigilance
Global affairs learning with a cross-cultural lens

supporting_evidence.pattern: Active participation in standards-focused identity interoperability communities
examples: [Openid-dcp] ISO interoperability Test Event Invitation (Nov 16-18, NZ)

supporting_evidence.pattern: Consistent attention to account security and sign-in monitoring
examples: New sign-in detected for your Microsoft account (two instances)

supporting_evidence.pattern: Curiosity about global affairs via cross-cultural narratives

framework_dimensions.external_connection: Engages globally through standards bodies (OpenID/ISO) and international commentary, valuing interoperability across borders.
framework_dimensions.active_engagement: Proactively joins or follows standards test events and maintains vigilant account hygiene; overall mixed but leaning active.
framework_dimensions.emotional_meaning: Derives purpose from making digital ecosystems safer and more interoperable, and joy from learning how different societies frame identity and culture.
framework_dimensions.voluntary_pursuit: Chosen subscriptions to standards lists and global affairs content indicate voluntary interest; security alerts are reactive but stem from a self-chosen vigilance practice.
framework_dimensions.everyday_joy: Small wins from checking sign-in activity, tightening settings, skimming standards updates, and reading concise cross-cultural pieces.
framework_dimensions.growth_orientation: Research-driven learning with intentional subscriptions; participation in interoperability testing and international dialogues supports continual development.

primary_themes: Global affairs curiosity with a cross-cultural lens
Professional community participation and standards collaboration

indicators: Multiple Microsoft security sign-in alerts on the same day indicate attention to account security
Microsoft ecosystem usage suggests practical concern for safeguarding access
Subscribed to OpenID Foundation digital credentials protocols list (professional standards community)
ISO interoperability test event invitation implies engagement with conformance, testing, and cross-org collaboration
Subscription to International Intrigue newsletter (curated world affairs)
Interest in the intersection of culture and politics (geopolitics of fashion week, cross-cultural references)
Invitation to New Zealand ISO interop event signals openness to global collaboration and potential travel
Standards work across jurisdictions implies comfort with international coordination

value_indicators: Commitment to open standards and interoperability
confidence_factors: Small, single-day sample with two automated security alerts may over-represent security signals
Chosen subscriptions (professional standards list, geopolitics newsletter) are strong but singular indicators of enduring interests

top_themes: Global affairs curiosity with a cross-cultural lens
Professional community participation and standards collaboration

recommendations: Deepen participation in OpenID/ISO events by proposing test cases and writing short debriefs to share with the community.
Establish a monthly 30-minute security hygiene ritual (credential audit, 2FA review, recovery method check).
Bridge tech and society: keep brief notes comparing identity systems across countries and share insights with peers.
Strengthen international ties by attending one global standards meeting per quarter and initiating two new practitioner connections.
Streamline routine sign-in alerts into a dashboard or weekly digest to maintain vigilance without distraction.
Protect everyday joy: set a weekly 15-minute window for a cross-cultural read and one standards thread to stay inspired.

methodology_details.phase_1: Holistic overview analysis across all emails to extract themes and patterns
methodology_details.phase_2: Contextual per-email scoring using holistic insights
methodology_details.phase_3: Synthesis and validation for comprehensive ikigai profile
methodology_details.context_window_optimization: Adaptive batching based on model capabilities
methodology_details.inclusive_approach: Analyzes ALL email types including commercial for complete picture

top_themes: Global affairs curiosity with a cross-cultural lens
Professional community participation and standards collaboration
